overview: Roger is in trouble, but he will bounce back. All he had to do was obtain a modest loan from Monsieur Durieu, a banker's son. But Durieu refuses him his money. Humiliated, Roger decides to take action: he kidnaps Durieu and handcuffs him in an abandoned barn. Monsieur Durieu then offers him a deal: break into the safe room of the bank of his sworn enemy. The two men fraternize around their new common cause, the one that could finally make them Great Lords.
title: Les Grands Seigneurs
